<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeGroupBase

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeResizableBase](class_visualshadernoderesizablebase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeExpression](class_visualshadernodeexpression.md)

Base class for a family of nodes with variable number of input and output ports within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Currently, has no direct usage, use the derived classes instead.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_input_port"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Adds an input port with the specified `type` (see [PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType)) and `name`.

Adds an output port with the specified `type` (see [PortType](class_visualshadernode.md#enum_VisualShaderNode_PortType)) and `name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_input_ports**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_clear_input_ports)

Removes all previously specified input ports.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_output_ports**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_clear_output_ports)

Removes all previously specified output ports.

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_free_input_port_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_free_input_port_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_free_input_port_id)

Returns a free input port ID which can be used in [add_input_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_input_port).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_free_output_port_id"></a>

Returns a free output port ID which can be used in [add_output_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_output_port).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_input_port_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_input_port_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_input_port_count)

Returns the number of input ports in use. Alternative for [get_free_input_port_id()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_free_input_port_id).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_inputs"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_inputs**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_inputs)

Returns a [String](class_string.md) description of the input ports as a colon-separated list using the format ``id,type,name;`` (see [add_input_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_input_port)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_output_port_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_output_port_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_output_port_count)

Returns the number of output ports in use. Alternative for [get_free_output_port_id()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_free_output_port_id).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_outputs"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_outputs**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_get_outputs)

Returns a [String](class_string.md) description of the output ports as a colon-separated list using the format ``id,type,name;`` (see [add_output_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_output_port)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns ``true`` if the specified port name does not override an existed port name and is valid within the shader.

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_inputs**\ (\ inputs\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_set_inputs)

Defines all input ports using a [String](class_string.md) formatted as a colon-separated list: ``id,type,name;`` (see [add_input_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_input_port)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_set_outputs"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_outputs**\ (\ outputs\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_set_outputs)

Defines all output ports using a [String](class_string.md) formatted as a colon-separated list: ``id,type,name;`` (see [add_output_port()](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md#class_VisualShaderNodeGroupBase_method_add_output_port)).
